rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: Features a Scandinavian aesthetic with minimalistic design and natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. This space serves as the main entry point, aligning with Vastu principles by inviting positive energy.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A combined space for cooking and relaxation featuring a modern Scandinavian design with clean lines and an integrated island. The area is designed with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows, promoting a bright and airy feel.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, incorporating elements of Scandinavian design like neutral colors and functional storage. The room's orientation considers Vastu principles for harmony and relaxation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom designed to accommodate visiting family members, integrating Scandinavian style with simplicity and elegance. The layout respects traditional Vastu alignments.

openings.description: Large windows that provide ample natural light and a strong connection to the outdoors, enhancing both aesthetics and energy flow.
A glass door for seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces, inviting fresh air while adhering to Vastu principles by maintaining spatial balance.

garden_access.description: Direct access from the open-plan kitchen and living area to a large garden designed with Scandinavian landscaping elements. The garden emphasizes greenery and sustainable practices, contributing to relaxation and improved air quality.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A bedroom suitable for joint family members, maintaining a balance of privacy while incorporating Scandinavian design elements such as light colors and clean lines.

rooms.name: Study/Work Area
rooms.description: A versatile space designed for work or study purposes, featuring minimalistic Scandinavian furniture and ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows in one section.

openings.description: Large window ensuring abundant natural light, crucial for productivity and maintaining a bright atmosphere in line with Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A bedroom with integrated bathroom facilities designed to cater to the needs of a joint family, emphasizing privacy while still following Vastu guidelines.
